data.message: Facebook Why cant you make it possibly for us to make our own themes on our facebook accounts... kinda like on MySpace. Its sooo boring just looking at the same old blue/white colors all the time :(

replies.message: Thanks for your suggestion, Søs! We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community and will let our team know. If you have anymore ideas please, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1qi8brs. -Jenny

I think that facebook should have all different types backgrounds with the wall papers of our choice instead of a white screen and people should beable to see one another when should have a radio station and have music of our choice on our facebook pages.
